metadata.dc:author: Londo√µ, R
metadata.dc:description: The combination of L-dopa with carbidopa was administered to 18 patients with ediopathic Parkinson's disease and the dose needed to control the manifestations, either partially or completely, with the least number of side effects, was established.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento de la enfermedad de Parkinson con levodopa y un inhibidor de la dopadescarvoxilasa
[Treatment of Parkinson's disease with levodopa and a dopa decarboxylase inhibitor].
